ARABIC: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ ءَايَٰتِى تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْكُمْ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Were My Signs not recited to you and did you not deny them?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Were not My messages read out to you? But you denied them."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Are you not those to whom My revelations were recited, and you dubbed them as lies?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (They will be told), "Were Our revelations not recited to you and did you not call them lies?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Were not My verses recited to you, so you used to deny them?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Were not My Ayat recited to you, and then you used to deny them"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Were not My communications recited to you? But you used to reject them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: What, were My signs not recited to you, and you cried them lies?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (It will be said): Were not My revelations recited unto you, and then ye used to deny them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Were not My messages recited to you and did you not reject them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have not My revelations been rehearsed unto you, and them ye have been belying?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Was it not that My signs were recited to you but you would deny them?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Were not My Signs rehearsed to you, and ye did but treat them as falsehood?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Were not My Verses (this Quran) recited to you, and then you used to deny them?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (We shall say): 'Were My verses not recited to you, and did you not belie them'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Were not My revelations recited to you, and you kept on rejecting them?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:105] ‘Were not My signs, in the Qur’ān, recited to you, were you [not] threatened therewith, and you used to deny them?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah says to them: (Were not My revelations) the Qur'an (recited unto you) in the life of the world, (and then ye used to deny them) and you used to disbelieve in the revelations?
